# Threshold of health status

The threshold limits that change the environment's health status from green to red can be viewed in the following image:

![Threshold limits](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/93a99715-c01c-4693-887d-7e8c4cb1ff1b?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Z-kUan7sZP0Wnfgs4Fp5PXoKXgEjUDV99iQxxlsq_Z4)
